text: Skazhi im (o Mukhammad!): "Yesli vy iskrenne lyubite Allakha i zhelayete, chtoby On vas lyubil, to sleduyte za mnoy v tom, chto ya vam prikazyvayu, i ne delayte togo, chto ya vam zapreshchayu. Ved' ya peredayu nisposlannoye mne Pisaniye Allakha. Allakh budet za eto vas lyubit' i prostit vse vashi pregresheniya. Poistine, Allakh - proshchayushchiy, miloserdnyy k Svoim rabam
